akn:content.akn:p:
§ 90111. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to the foundation for carrying out the purposes of this chapter—(1) $5,000,000 for fiscal year 2003; and
(2) such sums as may be necessary for each succeeding fiscal year.
(Added Pub. L. 107–252, title VI, § 601(a), Oct. 29, 2002, 116 Stat. 1721, § 152611; renumbered § 90111, Pub. L. 113–237, § 3(c)(6)(B), Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2840.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2014—Pub. L. 113–237 renumbered section 152611 of this title as this section.
(2) such sums as may be necessary for each succeeding fiscal year.
